query.sql: SELECT c.card_id from card c inner join attribute_value vLink on (vLink.card_id = c.card_id) inner join card cLink on (cLink.card_id = vLink.number_value) inner join attribute_value vUser on (vUser.card_id = cLink.card_id) inner join attribute_value vUrg on (vUrg.card_id = cLink.card_id) where c.status_id = 108 and vLink.attribute_code = 'JBR_SIGN_SIGNING' and cLink.status_id = 108 and vUser.attribute_code = 'JBR_SIGN_RESPONSIBLE' and vUser.number_value = %CURRENTUSER% and vUrg.attribute_code = 'JBR_HOWFAST' and vUrg.value_id = 1912
